rolit

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • rolit.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.util.Observable
    Class that initializes, maintains and analyzes the board of the RolIt game.
    Version:
    1.6.0
    Author:
    Victor Lap and Yuri van Midden

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIM 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Constructs a new board with the four initial RolIt balls in the middle.

      • doMove

        public void doMove(int field,
          Color color)
        Does the move with setField, assuming it can be done and does not violate the rules i.e. there is at least one bordering field that has a color.
        Parameters:
        field - to change Color.VALUE of
        color - to change the field to.

      • getFlippableFields

        public boolean[] getFlippableFields(Color color)
        Creates an array of booleans with the fields that would flip other's fields if picked.
        Parameters:
        color - to get the flippable fields for
        Returns:
        boolean[] with DIM*DIM entries that shows at index which fields are flippable.
